svg.metadata:
Created by FontForge 20110222 at Wed Nov 13 13:22:32 2013 By Orthosie Webhosting Glyphs are taken from "Lohit Bengali" made by Automatic Control Equipments, Pune, INDIA & adapted to UNICODE by the contributors of www.ekushey.org
TrueType hintings have been added by Alamigr Mohammed (alamgir99@gmail.com) and Ershadul Haq (ershad@gmail.com) and distributed as Apona Lohit from http://www.apona-bd.com or http://www.joomla.org.bd
